tournament.name: Sprint Wheel Event - Geddon Series 1^ tappa Spring Ed. 2025

decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to quickly ramp up mana with cards like Wild Growth and Utopia Sprawl, allowing for early creature drops. Malevolent Rumble is used to clear the opponent's board while Avenging Hunter and Nyxborn Hydra provide powerful threats. Vines of Vastwood and Ram Through can help push through damage or deal with opposing threats. Writhing Chrysalis and Jewel Thief provide additional creature options, while Arbor Elf and Eldrazi Repurposer help maintain mana advantage. Bannerhide Krushok serves as a resilient finisher, making this deck a solid Mono Green Aggro option in Pauper 1 vs 1 format.

The main focus of this Dimir Control deck is to efficiently control the game by countering opponent's spells, disrupting their hand with discard effects, and generating card advantage through draw spells. It also utilizes efficient removal spells to deal with threats on the board. The deck aims to stabilize the game in the early turns, leading to powerful late-game threats such as Cryptic Serpent and Gurmag Angler. The mana base is set up to support the deck's color requirements and provide consistency in casting spells.

The main focus of this deck is to utilize reanimation spells like Exhume and Deadly Dispute to cheat out powerful creatures like Troll of Khazad-d√ªm and Horror of the Broken Lands. By using cards like Haunting Misery and Dirge of Dread, the deck can quickly build up a formidable board presence and overwhelm opponents with a combination of large creatures and creature recursion. The deck also includes cards like Dark Ritual and Lotus Petal to help accelerate its game plan, making it a potent combo-reanimator deck in the Pauper 1 vs 1 format.
